view

Class CountdownPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • view.CountdownPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class CountdownPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Class that represents the timer for a timed Battleship match. If the BattleshipModel is initialized as "timed", according to the time of initialization it has stored, this class creates a JPanel with a Timer initialized with the same count down as the BattleshipModel.
    Author:
    20027017 & 20031485
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
